p: Usually, EOs are applied in water prior to handling. However, it would be interesting to test the efficacy of EOs if other means of administration were used. In this sense, dietary addition (0.5–2.0 mL⋅kg –1) of cinnamon ( Cinnamomun sp.) EO did not alter plasma cortisol and glucose levels of Nile tilapia exposed to air for 3 min compared to control fish, which was fed diet without this EO and subjected to the same procedure) ( Santos et al., 2016).
